trans-unit.source: Provides services for managing the queue of work items for a thread.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i servizi per la gestione della coda di elementi di lavoro per un thread.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> maintains a prioritized queue of work items for a specific thread.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> gestisce una coda con priorità degli elementi di lavoro per un thread specifico.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is created on a thread, it becomes the only <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that can be associated with the thread, even if the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is shut down.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> viene creato in un thread, diventa l'unico <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> che può essere associato al thread, anche se il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> è stato arrestato.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to get the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> for the current thread and a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is not associated with the thread, a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will be created.
trans-unit.target: Se si tenta di ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> per il thread corrente e un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> non è associato al thread, un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> verrà creato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is also created when you create a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> viene creato anche quando si crea un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.

trans-unit.source: If you create a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> on a background thread, be sure to shut down the dispatcher before exiting the thread.
trans-unit.target: Se si crea un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> in un thread in background, assicurarsi di arrestare il dispatcher prima della chiusura del thread.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is shut down, it cannot be restarted.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> è arrestato, non può essere riavviato.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> can only be accessed by the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> accessibile solo per il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> è associato.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un thread in background non è possibile aggiornare il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> associato il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> sul [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Affinché il thread in background accedere il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, il thread in background deve delegare il lavoro dal <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associato il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione viene eseguita utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> è sincrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> è asincrono.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: L'operazione viene aggiunto nella coda degli elementi di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> specificato <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> viene chiamato su un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> che arrestato, la proprietà status dell'oggetto restituito <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.

trans-unit.source: All of the methods on <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, with the exception of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A>, are free-threaded.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i metodi di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, ad eccezione di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A>, sono a thread libero.

trans-unit.source: Objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> have thread affinity.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti che derivano da <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> presentano affinità di thread.

trans-unit.source: Objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> are free-threaded when they are frozen.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti che derivano da <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> sono a thread libero quando sono bloccati.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Cenni preliminari sugli oggetti Freezable](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to place an operation onto a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come inserire un'operazione in un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: For the full source code of this example, see [Single-Threaded Application with Long-Running Calculation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038).
trans-unit.target: Per il codice sorgente completo di questo esempio, vedere [applicazione Single-Threaded con esecuzione prolungata calcolo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038).

trans-unit.source: First, a delegate is created that accepts no arguments.
trans-unit.target: Innanzitutto, viene creato un delegato che non accetta argomenti.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> is called.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: This call to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> takes two parameters: the priority, which is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the callback, which is passed in through an instance of the delegate `NextPrimeDelegate`.
trans-unit.target: Questa chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> accetta due parametri: la priorità, che è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>e il callback passato tramite un'istanza del delegato `NextPrimeDelegate`.

trans-unit.source: Executes a delegate asynchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo asincrono un delegato sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], solo i thread che ha creato un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> può accedere all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un thread in background che viene rimosso dal thread principale della UI non è possibile aggiornare il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> creato sul thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Affinché il thread in background accedere alla proprietà di contenuto di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, il thread in background deve delegare il lavoro dal <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associata al thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione viene eseguita utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> è sincrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> è asincrono.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: L'operazione viene aggiunta alla coda degli eventi di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> specificato <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> è asincrona; Pertanto, restituendo immediatamente il controllo per l'oggetto chiamante dopo la chiamata.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object that can be used to interact with the delegate when the delegate is in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> Restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> oggetto che può essere utilizzato per interagire con il delegato quando il delegato incluso nella coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object returned by <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as:
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> oggetto restituito da <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> può essere usato in vari modi per interagire con il delegato specificato, ad esempio:

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Modifica il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> del delegato mentre è in attesa esecuzione nella coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: Removing the delegate from the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimozione del delegato dalla coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for the delegate to return.
trans-unit.target: In attesa di delegato da restituire.

trans-unit.source: Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Viene eseguito il recupero del valore restituito dal delegato dopo di esso.

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> calls are made at the same <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, they will be executed in the order the calls were made.
trans-unit.target: Se più <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> chiamate vengono eseguite contemporaneamente <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, verranno eseguite nell'ordine in cui sono state effettuate.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> viene chiamato su un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> che arrestato, la proprietà status dell'oggetto restituito <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in <c>args</c>, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: Delegato a un metodo che accetta i parametri specificati in <c>args</c>, inserito nella coda di eventi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti da passare come argomenti al metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Può essere <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified arguments on the thread that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> was created on.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo asincrono il delegato specificato con gli argomenti specificati sul thread in cui è stato creato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An object, which is returned immediately after <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> is called, that can be used to interact with the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto, restituito immediatamente dopo la chiamata a <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" />, utilizzabile per l'interazione con il delegato mentre è in attesa di esecuzione nella coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object returned by <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as:
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> oggetto restituito da <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> può essere usato in vari modi per interagire con il delegato specificato, ad esempio:

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Modifica il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> del delegato mentre è in attesa esecuzione nella coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: Removing the delegate from the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimozione del delegato dalla coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for the delegate to return.
trans-unit.target: In attesa di delegato da restituire.

trans-unit.source: Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Viene eseguito il recupero del valore restituito dal delegato dopo di esso.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> è asincrona; Pertanto, restituendo immediatamente il controllo per l'oggetto chiamante dopo la chiamata.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], solo i thread che ha creato un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> può accedere all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un thread in background che viene rimosso dal thread principale della UI non è possibile aggiornare il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> creato sul thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Priorità, rispetto alle altre operazioni in sospeso nella coda degli eventi di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />, con la quale viene richiamato il metodo specificato.

trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> viene chiamato su un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> che arrestato, la proprietà status dell'oggetto restituito <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to place an operation onto a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come inserire un'operazione in un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: For the full source code of this example, see [Single-Threaded Application with Long-Running Calculation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038).
trans-unit.target: Per il codice sorgente completo di questo esempio, vedere [applicazione Single-Threaded con esecuzione prolungata calcolo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038).

trans-unit.source: First, a delegate is created that accepts no arguments.
trans-unit.target: Innanzitutto, viene creato un delegato che non accetta argomenti.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> is called.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: Because every <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> has a property that returns the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> it is associated with, the desired <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is obtained by querying the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>, in this case a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> named `startStopButton`.
trans-unit.target: Poiché ogni <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> ha una proprietà che restituisce il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> è associata all'oggetto desiderato <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> viene ottenuto eseguendo una query di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>in questo caso, un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> denominato `startStopButton`.

trans-unit.source: The call to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> takes two parameters: the priority, which is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the callback, which is passed in through an instance of the delegate `NextPrimeDelegate`.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> accetta due parametri: la priorità, che è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>e il callback passato tramite un'istanza del delegato `NextPrimeDelegate`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="priority" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="priority" /> non è un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> valido.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in <c>args</c>, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: Delegato a un metodo che accetta i parametri specificati in <c>args</c>, inserito nella coda di eventi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Priorità, rispetto alle altre operazioni in sospeso nella coda degli eventi di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />, con la quale viene richiamato il metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti da passare come argomenti al metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Può essere <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified arguments, at the specified priority, on the thread that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> was created on.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo asincrono il delegato specificato con gli argomenti specificati, con la priorità specificata, sul thread in cui è stato creato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An object, which is returned immediately after <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> is called, that can be used to interact with the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto, restituito immediatamente dopo la chiamata a <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" />, utilizzabile per l'interazione con il delegato mentre è in attesa di esecuzione nella coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object returned by <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as:
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> oggetto restituito da <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> può essere usato in vari modi per interagire con il delegato specificato, ad esempio:

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Modifica il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> del delegato mentre è in attesa esecuzione nella coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: Removing the delegate from the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimozione del delegato dalla coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for the delegate to return.
trans-unit.target: In attesa di delegato da restituire.

trans-unit.source: Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Viene eseguito il recupero del valore restituito dal delegato dopo di esso.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> è asincrona; Pertanto, restituendo immediatamente il controllo per l'oggetto chiamante dopo la chiamata.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], solo i thread che ha creato un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> può accedere all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un thread in background che viene rimosso dal thread principale della UI non è possibile aggiornare il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> creato sul thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Affinché il thread in background accedere alla proprietà di contenuto di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, il thread in background deve delegare il lavoro dal <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associata al thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione viene eseguita utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> è sincrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> è asincrono.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: L'operazione viene aggiunta alla coda degli eventi di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> specificato <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> viene chiamato su un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> che arrestato, la proprietà status dell'oggetto restituito <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.

trans-unit.target: Delegato a un metodo che accetta un argomento, inserito nella coda degli eventi di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], solo i thread che ha creato un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> può accedere all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Affinché il thread in background accedere alla proprietà di contenuto di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, il thread in background deve delegare il lavoro dal <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associata al thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione viene eseguita utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.target: L'operazione viene aggiunta alla coda degli eventi di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> specificato <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> calls are made at the same <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, they will be executed in the order the calls were made.
trans-unit.target: Se più <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> chiamate vengono eseguite contemporaneamente <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, verranno eseguite nell'ordine in cui sono state effettuate.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to place an operation onto a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come inserire un'operazione in un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: First, a delegate is created that accepts one argument, in this case a string.
trans-unit.target: Innanzitutto, viene creato un delegato che accetta un solo argomento, in questo caso una stringa.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Object%29> is called.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Object%29> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: Because every <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> has a property that returns the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> it is associated with, the desired <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is obtained by querying the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>, in this case a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> named `tomorrowsWeather`.
trans-unit.target: Poiché ogni <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> ha una proprietà che restituisce il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> è associata all'oggetto desiderato <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> viene ottenuto eseguendo una query di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>in questo caso, un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> denominato `tomorrowsWeather`.

trans-unit.source: The call to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Object%29> takes three parameters: the priority, which is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>; the callback, which is passed in through an instance of the delegate `OneArgDelegate`; and a string named `weather`, which is the argument for the callback.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Object%29> accetta tre parametri: la priorità, che è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>; il callback passato tramite un'istanza del delegato `OneArgDelegate`; e una stringa denominata `weather`, che rappresenta l'argomento per il callback.

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> calls are made at the same <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, they will be executed in the order the calls were made.
trans-unit.target: Se più <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> chiamate vengono eseguite contemporaneamente <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, verranno eseguite nell'ordine in cui sono state effettuate.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> viene chiamato su un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> che arrestato, la proprietà status dell'oggetto restituito <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> is not a valid priority.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> non è una priorità valida.

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to begin shutting down the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Priorità con la quale iniziare ad arrestare il dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Initiates shutdown of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Inizia in modo asincrono l'arresto di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvokeShutdown%2A> demands unrestricted UI Permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvokeShutdown%2A> Autorizzazioni di interfaccia utente senza restrizioni richieste.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> inizia l'arresto, la <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> è impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> non arresta completamente finché la coda degli eventi viene rimosso.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Al termine dell'arresto, il Dispatcher di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> è impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Una volta avviato il processo di arresto, tutte in sospeso di lavoro vengono interrotti elementi nella coda.

trans-unit.source: for shutting down the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Per arrestare il dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazioni associate: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the calling thread is the thread associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il thread chiamante è il thread associato a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the calling thread is the thread associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il thread chiamante è il thread associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />, in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> is created on may access the object.
trans-unit.target: Solo il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> che un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> viene creato in cui possono accedere all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> to access the object from a different thread.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> per accedere all'oggetto da un thread diverso.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> può essere chiamato da qualsiasi thread.

trans-unit.source: The difference between <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> returns a Boolean indicating whether the calling thread has access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: La differenza tra <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> è <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> restituisce un valore booleano che indica se il thread chiamante dispone dell'accesso per il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> genera un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> to determine whether a thread has access to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente usa <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> per determinare se un thread ha accesso a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is called to verify access to the thread.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associato il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> viene chiamato per verificare l'accesso al thread.

trans-unit.source: If the calling thread has access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is updated by accessing the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>; otherwise, a delegate, which accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> as an argument, is placed onto the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Se il thread chiamante ha accesso al <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> viene aggiornato per l'accesso ai membri del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>; in caso contrario, un delegato che accetta un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> come argomento, viene inserito nel <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will delegate the work of updating the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> delegherà l'operazione di aggiornamento di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> for the thread currently executing and creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> if one is not already associated with the thread.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> per il thread attualmente in esecuzione e crea un nuovo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> se al thread non ne è già associato uno.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Dispatcher associato al thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is not associated with the current thread, a new <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will be created.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> non è associato il thread corrente, un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> verrà creato.

trans-unit.source: This is not the case with the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Non è il caso del metodo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> will return `null` if there is not a dispatcher associated with the specified thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> restituirà `null` se non è disponibile un dispatcher associato al thread specificato.

trans-unit.source: Disables processing of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> queue.
trans-unit.target: Disabilita l'elaborazione della coda di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure used to re-enable dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: Struttura utilizzata per attivare nuovamente l'elaborazione del dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Disabling dispatcher processing is an advanced method that is intended to eliminate the chance of unrelated reentrancy.
trans-unit.target: Disabilitare l'elaborazione del dispatcher è un metodo avanzato è pensato per eliminare la possibilità di reentrancy non correlata.

trans-unit.source: The effects of disabling processing are as follows:
trans-unit.target: Gli effetti della disabilitazione dell'elaborazione sono i seguenti:

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr#initcap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clrsharpinitcap-md.md)] locks will not pump messages internally.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr#initcap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clrsharpinitcap-md.md)] i blocchi non saranno il message pump internamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> objects are not allowed to be pushed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> gli oggetti non è consentiti il push.

trans-unit.source: Message processing is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: Non è consentita l'elaborazione dei messaggi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> structure that <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> returns when it is called can be used to re-enable dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> struttura <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> restituisce quando viene chiamata può essere utilizzato per abilitare nuovamente l'elaborazione del dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> structure re-enables processing.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A> sul <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> struttura riabilita l'elaborazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> can only be called on the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> può essere chiamato solo sul thread di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> è associato.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to disable dispatcher processing and re-enable dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come disabilitare e riabilitare l'elaborazione del dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> is called in a **using** statement.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> viene chiamato un **utilizzando** istruzione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> structure that is used as the object to be disposed when the **using** block finishes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> Restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> struttura utilizzata come oggetto di essere eliminato quando il **utilizzando** bloccare al termine.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A> is called on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> structure, dispatcher processing is re-enabled.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A> viene chiamato sul <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> struttura, l'elaborazione del dispatcher viene riabilitato.

trans-unit.source: Requests that all frames exit, including nested frames.
trans-unit.target: Richiede l'uscita di tutti i frame, inclusi i frame annidati.

trans-unit.source: for calling this method.
trans-unit.target: per chiamare questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazioni associate: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: The thread to obtain the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> from.
trans-unit.target: Thread dal quale ottenere <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> for the specified thread.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> per il thread specificato.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher for <paramref name="thread" />.
trans-unit.target: Dispatcher per <paramref name="thread" />.

trans-unit.source: If a dispatcher is not available for the specified thread, `null` will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Se non è disponibile per il thread specificato, un dispatcher `null` verranno restituiti.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> does not create a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> on a thread that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> non crea un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> su un thread che non dispone di un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is created on a thread that does not already have a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> when attempting to get the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> viene creato su un thread che non dispone già di un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> durante il tentativo di ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> has finished shutting down.
trans-unit.target: Determina se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> ha terminato l'arresto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the dispatcher has finished shutting down; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il dispatcher ha concluso l'arresto, in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> inizia l'arresto, la <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> è impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> non si arresta completamente fino a quando non rimuove la coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Al termine dell'arresto, il Dispatcher di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> è impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Una volta avviato il processo di arresto, tutte in sospeso di lavoro vengono interrotti elementi nella coda.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is shutting down.
trans-unit.target: Determina se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> si stia arrestando.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> has started shutting down; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> ha iniziato l'arresto, in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> inizia l'arresto, la <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> è impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> non arresta completamente finché la coda degli eventi viene rimosso.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Al termine dell'arresto, il Dispatcher di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> è impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Una volta avviato il processo di arresto, tutte in sospeso di lavoro vengono interrotti elementi nella coda.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of hooks that provide additional event information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme di hook che forniscono informazioni aggiuntive sull'evento relativamente a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The hooks associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Hook associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherHooks> class provides additional event information about the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, such as when the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is inactive or when an operation has competed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherHooks> classe vengono fornite informazioni aggiuntive sul <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, ad esempio quando il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> è inattivo o quando un'operazione è stata completata.

trans-unit.source: for getting this property.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazioni associate: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo sincrono il delegato specificato sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], solo i thread che ha creato un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> può accedere all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un thread in background che viene rimosso dal thread principale della UI non è possibile aggiornare il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> creato sul thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Affinché il thread in background accedere alla proprietà di contenuto di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, il thread in background deve delegare il lavoro dal <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associata al thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione viene eseguita utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> è sincrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> è asincrono.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: L'operazione viene aggiunta alla coda degli eventi di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> specificato <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is a synchronous operation; therefore, control will not return to the calling object until after the callback returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> è un'operazione sincrona. Pertanto, controllo non verrà restituito per l'oggetto chiamante fino a dopo il callback restituisce.

trans-unit.source: The following example places a delegate onto a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal> using <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene inserito un delegato in un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> in <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal> utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to invoke through the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Un delegato da richiamare tramite il dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified <see cref="T:System.Action" /> synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo sincrono il <see cref="T:System.Action" /> specificato sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to invoke through the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Un delegato da richiamare tramite il dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: The priority that determines in what order the specified callback is invoked relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: La priorità che determina l'ordine con cui il callback specificato viene richiamato rispetto alle altre operazioni in sospeso in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified <see cref="T:System.Action" /> synchronously at the specified priority on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo sincrono il <see cref="T:System.Action" /> specificato con la priorità specificata sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in <c>args</c>, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: Un delegato a un metodo che accetta i parametri specificati in <c>args</c>, inserito nella coda di eventi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti da passare come argomenti al metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Può essere <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo asincrono il delegato specificato con gli argomenti specificati sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked or <see langword="null" /> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: Valore restituito dal delegato richiamato oppure <see langword="null" /> se il delegato non restituisce alcun valore.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], solo i thread che ha creato un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> può accedere all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un thread in background che viene rimosso dal thread principale della UI non è possibile aggiornare il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> creato sul thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Affinché il thread in background accedere alla proprietà di contenuto di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, il thread in background deve delegare il lavoro dal <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associata al thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione viene eseguita utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> è sincrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> è asincrono.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: L'operazione viene aggiunta alla coda degli eventi di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> specificato <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is a synchronous operation; therefore, control will not return to the calling object until after the callback returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> è un'operazione sincrona. Pertanto, controllo non verrà restituito per l'oggetto chiamante fino a dopo il callback restituisce.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Priorità, rispetto alle altre operazioni in sospeso nella coda degli eventi di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />, con la quale viene richiamato il metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes no arguments, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: Delegato a un metodo che non accetta argomenti, inserito nella coda degli eventi di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate synchronously at the specified priority on the thread on which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo sincrono il delegato specificato con la priorità specificata sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked or <see langword="null" /> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: Valore restituito dal delegato richiamato oppure <see langword="null" /> se il delegato non restituisce alcun valore.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.

trans-unit.source: The following example places a delegate onto a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal> using <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene inserito un delegato in un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> in <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal> utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="priority" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Inactive" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="priority" /> è uguale a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Inactive" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="priority" /> is not a valid priority.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="priority" /> non è una priorità valida.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to invoke through the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Un delegato da richiamare tramite il dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: The priority that determines in what order the specified callback is invoked relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: La priorità che determina l'ordine con cui il callback specificato viene richiamato rispetto alle altre operazioni in sospeso in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that indicates whether to cancel the action.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che indica se annullare l'azione.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified <see cref="T:System.Action" /> synchronously at the specified priority on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo sincrono il <see cref="T:System.Action" /> specificato con la priorità specificata sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in <c>args</c>, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: Un delegato a un metodo che accetta i parametri specificati in <c>args</c>, inserito nella coda di eventi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of time to wait for the operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: Periodo di tempo massimo di attesa del completamento dell'operazione.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti da passare come argomenti al metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Può essere <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate within the designated time span at the specified priority with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo sincrono il delegato specificato entro l'intervallo di tempo designato con la priorità e gli argomenti specificati sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked or <see langword="null" /> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: Valore restituito dal delegato richiamato oppure <see langword="null" /> se il delegato non restituisce alcun valore.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is a synchronous operation; therefore, control will not return to the calling object until after the callback returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> è un'operazione sincrona. Pertanto, controllo non verrà restituito per l'oggetto chiamante fino a dopo il callback restituisce.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to invoke through the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Un delegato da richiamare tramite il dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: The priority that determines in what order the specified callback is invoked relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: La priorità che determina l'ordine con cui il callback specificato viene richiamato rispetto alle altre operazioni in sospeso in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that indicates whether to cancel the action.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che indica se annullare l'azione.

trans-unit.source: The minimum amount of time to wait for the operation to start.
trans-unit.target: Periodo di tempo minimo di attesa dell'avvio dell'operazione.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified <see cref="T:System.Action" /> synchronously at the specified priority on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo sincrono il <see cref="T:System.Action" /> specificato con la priorità specificata sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in <c>args</c>, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: Un delegato a un metodo che accetta i parametri specificati in <c>args</c>, inserito nella coda di eventi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of time to wait for the operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: Periodo di tempo massimo di attesa del completamento dell'operazione.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Priorità, rispetto alle altre operazioni in sospeso nella coda degli eventi di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />, con la quale viene richiamato il metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti da passare come argomenti al metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Può essere <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate within the designated time span at the specified priority with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo sincrono il delegato specificato entro l'intervallo di tempo designato con la priorità e gli argomenti specificati sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked or <see langword="null" /> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: Valore restituito dal delegato richiamato oppure <see langword="null" /> se il delegato non restituisce alcun valore.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], solo i thread che ha creato un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> può accedere all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un thread in background che viene rimosso dal thread principale della UI non è possibile aggiornare il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> creato sul thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Affinché il thread in background accedere alla proprietà di contenuto di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, il thread in background deve delegare il lavoro dal <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associata al thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione viene eseguita utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> è sincrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> è asincrono.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: L'operazione viene aggiunta alla coda degli eventi di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> specificato <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is a synchronous operation; therefore, control will not return to the calling object until after the callback returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> è un'operazione sincrona. Pertanto, controllo non verrà restituito per l'oggetto chiamante fino a dopo il callback restituisce.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Priorità, rispetto alle altre operazioni in sospeso nella coda degli eventi di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />, con la quale viene richiamato il metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes multiple arguments, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: Delegato a un metodo che accetta più argomenti, inserito nella coda degli eventi di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An object to pass as an argument to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da passare come argomento al metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti da passare come argomenti al metodo specificato.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate at the specified priority with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo sincrono il delegato specificato con la priorità e gli argomenti specificati sul thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked or <see langword="null" /> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: Valore restituito dal delegato richiamato oppure <see langword="null" /> se il delegato non restituisce alcun valore.

trans-unit.source: `Arg` can be `null` if an argument is not needed
trans-unit.target: `Arg` può essere `null` se non è necessario un argomento.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], solo i thread che ha creato un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> può accedere all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un thread in background che viene rimosso dal thread principale della UI non è possibile aggiornare il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> creato sul thread dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="priority" /> è uguale a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Inactive" />.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> è <see langword="null" />.
