trans-unit.source: Initiates the shutdown process of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Inizia il processo di arresto di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.InvokeShutdown%2A> demands unrestricted UI Permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.InvokeShutdown%2A> Autorizzazioni di interfaccia utente senza restrizioni richieste.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> inizia l'arresto, la <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> è impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> non arresta completamente finché la coda degli eventi viene rimosso.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Al termine dell'arresto, il Dispatcher di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> è impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Una volta avviato il processo di arresto, tutte in sospeso di lavoro vengono interrotti elementi nella coda.

trans-unit.source: for shutting down the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Per arrestare il dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazioni associate: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: The frame for the dispatcher to process.
trans-unit.target: Frame per il dispatcher da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: Enters an execute loop.
trans-unit.target: Immette un ciclo di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> represents a loop that processes pending work items.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> rappresenta un ciclo che elabora gli elementi di lavoro in sospeso.

trans-unit.source: The Dispatcher processes the work item queue in a loop.
trans-unit.target: Il Dispatcher elabora la coda di elementi di lavoro in un ciclo.

trans-unit.source: The loop is referred to as a frame.
trans-unit.target: Il ciclo viene considerato un frame.

trans-unit.source: The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il ciclo iniziale viene in genere avviato dall'applicazione chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.PushFrame%2A> enters a loop represented by the parameter `frame`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.PushFrame%2A> immette un ciclo rappresentato dal parametro `frame`.

trans-unit.source: At each iteration of the loop, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will check the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> class to determine whether the loop should continue or if it should stop.
trans-unit.target: A ogni iterazione del ciclo, il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> controllerà il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> proprietà la <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> classe per determinare se il ciclo deve continuare o se deve essere arrestata.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> allows for the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> property to be set explicitly and it respects the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> Consente di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> rispetta la proprietà viene impostata in modo esplicito e il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: This means when the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, frames that use the default <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> implementation will exit, which enables all nested frames to exit.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che, quando il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> inizia l'arresto, frame che utilizzano il valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> implementazione viene chiusa, che consente a tutti i frame annidati uscire dall'installazione.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> per ottenere risultati simili come il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="frame" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="frame" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished" /> is <see langword="true" />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished" /> è <see langword="true" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="frame" /> is running on a different <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="frame" /> è in esecuzione su un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> diverso.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: Dispatcher processing has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: L'elaborazione del dispatcher è stata disabilitata.

trans-unit.source: for pushing an execution frame.
trans-unit.target: per l'inserimento di un frame di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazioni associate: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Pushes the main execution frame on the event queue of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce il frame di esecuzione principale nella coda degli eventi di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> processes the event queue in a loop.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> elabora la coda degli eventi in un ciclo.

trans-unit.source: The loop is referred to as a frame.
trans-unit.target: Il ciclo viene considerato un frame.

trans-unit.source: The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il ciclo iniziale viene in genere avviato dall'applicazione chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The main execution frame will continue until the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is shutdown.
trans-unit.target: Il frame di esecuzione principale continuerà fino a quando il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> viene arrestato.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> finishes shutting down.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> termina l'arresto.

trans-unit.source: When the shutdown process of a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is started, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando il processo di arresto di un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> viene avviato, il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> è impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> non si arresta completamente fino a quando non rimuove la coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Al termine dell'arresto, il Dispatcher di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> è impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Una volta avviato il processo di arresto, tutte in sospeso di lavoro vengono interrotti elementi nella coda.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> begins to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> inizia l'arresto.

trans-unit.source: When the shutdown process of a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is started, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando il processo di arresto di un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> viene avviato, il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> è impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> non si arresta completamente fino a quando non rimuove la coda degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Al termine dell'arresto, il Dispatcher di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> evento viene generato e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> è impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Una volta avviato il processo di arresto, tutte in sospeso di lavoro vengono interrotti elementi nella coda.

trans-unit.source: Gets the thread this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il thread al quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> è associato.

trans-unit.source: The thread.
trans-unit.target: Thread.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" />.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene generata un'eccezione del thread non intercettata durante l'esecuzione di un delegato mediante <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke" /> o <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" />.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when an exception that was thrown during execution of a delegate by way of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is uncaught.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato quando un'eccezione generata durante l'esecuzione di un delegato per mezzo di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> non viene intercettata.

trans-unit.source: A handler can mark the exception as handled, which will prevent the internal exception handler from being called.
trans-unit.target: Un gestore può contrassegnare l'eccezione come gestito, che impedirà il gestore dell'eccezione interna la chiamata.

trans-unit.source: Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur.
trans-unit.target: Gestori eventi per questo evento devono essere scritto con attenzione per evitare di creare eccezioni secondarie e per rilevare eventuali che si verificano.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile evitare di allocare memoria o effettuare operazioni con uso intensivo nel gestore di qualsiasi risorsa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> evento fornisce un mezzo per non generare la <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event is raised first, and If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> evento viene generato per primo e se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> sul <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> è impostato su `false`, il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> non verrà generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> when in the filter stage.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene generata un'eccezione del thread non intercettata durante l'esecuzione di un delegato mediante <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke" /> o <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> in fase di filtro.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised during the filter stage for an exception that is raised during execution of a delegate by way of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> and is uncaught.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato in fase di filtro per un'eccezione generata durante l'esecuzione di un delegato per mezzo di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> e non viene intercettata.

trans-unit.source: The call stack is not unwound at this point (first-chance exception).
trans-unit.target: Lo stack di chiamate non viene rimosso a questo punto (eccezione first-chance).

trans-unit.source: Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur.
trans-unit.target: Gestori eventi per questo evento devono essere scritto con attenzione per evitare di creare eccezioni secondarie e per rilevare eventuali che si verificano.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile evitare di allocare memoria o effettuare operazioni con uso intensivo nel gestore di qualsiasi risorsa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> evento fornisce un mezzo per non generare la <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event is raised first, and If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> evento viene generato per primo e se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> sul <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> è impostato su `false`, il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> non verrà generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: for adding or removing a handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere o rimuovere un gestore per questo evento.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazioni associate: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: The priority to check.
trans-unit.target: Priorità da controllare.

trans-unit.source: A string that will be returned by the exception that occurs if the priority is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che verrà restituita dall'eccezione che si verifica se la priorità non è valida.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> is a valid priority.
trans-unit.target: Determina se la priorità stabilita dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> specificato sia valida.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="priority" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="priority" /> non è un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> valido.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the calling thread has access to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il thread chiamante ha accesso a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is created on may access the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Solo il thread di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> creato sarà accessibile il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: This method is public; therefore, any thread can check to see whether it has access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è pubblico; di conseguenza, qualsiasi thread può verificare se ha accesso al <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: The difference between <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> returns a Boolean if the calling thread does not have access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: La differenza tra <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> è <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> restituisce un valore booleano se il thread chiamante non dispone di accesso per il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> genera un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> to determine whether a thread has access to the thread that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> was created on.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente usa <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> per determinare se un thread ha accesso al thread che un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> è stato creato.

trans-unit.source: The method takes an object as an argument, which is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo accetta un oggetto come argomento, viene eseguito il cast a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is called to verify access to the thread.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> viene chiamato per verificare l'accesso al thread.

trans-unit.source: If the calling thread has access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is updated by just accessing the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Se il thread chiamante ha accesso al <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> viene aggiornato per l'accesso solo ai membri del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: If the calling thread does not have access, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se il thread chiamante non dispone di accesso, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> viene generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: This example catches the exception and pushes a delegate, which accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> as an argument, onto the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio rileva l'eccezione e viene inserito un delegato che accetta un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> come argomento, nel <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will do the work of updating the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> l'operazione di aggiornamento di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: The calling thread does not have access to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Il thread chiamante non ha accesso a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto awaitable che restituisce in modo asincrono il controllo al dispatcher corrente e offre al dispatcher la possibilità di elaborare altri eventi.

trans-unit.source: Creates an awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto awaitable che restituisce in modo asincrono il controllo al dispatcher corrente e offre al dispatcher la possibilità di elaborare altri eventi.

trans-unit.source: An awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto awaitable che restituisce in modo asincrono il controllo al dispatcher corrente e consente a quest'ultimo di elaborare altri eventi.

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo fornisce un modo rilasciare temporaneamente il controllo di esecuzione per il dispatcher corrente in modo è possibile eseguire altre operazioni, ad esempio elaborare altri eventi.

trans-unit.source: Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il `await`, o `Await` in Visual Basic, l'operatore sul valore restituito per restituire il controllo al dispatcher corrente.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo se desidera possibilità di elaborare gli eventi, mentre l'app esegue il lavoro nel thread UI dell'app.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile utilizzare questo metodo in un ciclo a esecuzione prolungata che aggiorna un controllo.

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Yield%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%29> method and passing in <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Background?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è equivalente alla chiamata di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Yield%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%29> metodo e passando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Background?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to schedule the continuation.
trans-unit.target: Priorità con cui pianificare la continuazione.

trans-unit.source: Creates an awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto awaitable che restituisce in modo asincrono il controllo al dispatcher corrente e offre al dispatcher la possibilità di elaborare altri eventi.

trans-unit.source: The work that occurs when control returns to the code awaiting the result of this method is scheduled with the specified priority.
trans-unit.target: Il lavoro che si verifica quando il controllo ritorna al codice in attesa del risultato di questo metodo viene pianificato in base alla priorità specificata.

trans-unit.source: An awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto awaitable che restituisce in modo asincrono il controllo al dispatcher corrente e consente a quest'ultimo di elaborare altri eventi.

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo fornisce un modo rilasciare temporaneamente il controllo di esecuzione per il dispatcher corrente in modo è possibile eseguire altre operazioni, ad esempio elaborare altri eventi.

trans-unit.source: Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il `await`, o `Await` in Visual Basic, l'operatore sul valore restituito per restituire il controllo al dispatcher corrente.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo se desidera possibilità di elaborare gli eventi, mentre l'app esegue il lavoro nel thread UI dell'app.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile utilizzare questo metodo in un ciclo a esecuzione prolungata che aggiorna un controllo.
